name: Hide_Ges_Columns
action:
<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(MSE_Addi_Labor_GES_%,MSE_Engineering_Labor_GES_%)*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Engineering_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
<*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Unit_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_Regional_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_ListPrice).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_WTW_Cost).SetPermission(Hidden) )*><*CTX ( Container(MSE_Additional_Labor_Container).Column(GES_MPA_Price).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>
